summary.span: 封裝 Windows Internet Explorer、 和 可巡覽及裝載的一頁內容。

span.span: Encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated to and hosted by Windows Internet Explorer, , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會封裝一頁，可以瀏覽，並具有下列索引鍵成員的內容： encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated, and has the following key members: - **生命週期管理**: 。**Lifetime Management**: . - **瀏覽**: 。**Navigation**: . - **外觀**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Appearance**: , , , , , , , . - **主控視窗外觀**: ， ， 。**Host Window Appearance**: , , . 可以使用標記、 標記和程式碼後置或程式碼定義 頁面。A page can be defined by using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 頁面會是封裝內容以供巡覽，較好的方法，原因如下：A page is the preferred way to package content for navigation, for the following reasons: - 它是定義、 重複使用，以及管理變得更加容易。It is easy to define, reuse, and manage. - 它可以存取和使用，導覽到它。It can access and use the that navigated to it. - 它可以改變標題、 寬度、 高度和瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]其主視窗 (， ， ， )。It can alter the title, width, height, and navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of its host window (, , , ). - 它有設計工具支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]。It has designer support in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]. 可以與裝載網頁， ， ，或從瀏覽器。A page can be hosted from , , , or from a browser. 若要裝載，頁面可以是：To be hosted, a page can be: - 直接子系， ，或中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The direct child of a , , or element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. - 具現化，並將設定的值為`Content`的屬性， ，和。Instantiated and set as the value of the `Content` property of , , and . - 設定為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]根源`Source`property或。Set as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] source of the `Source` property of either or . - 設定為獨立應用程式。Set as the in a standalone application. - 設定為在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Set as the in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 應用程式通常會有兩個或多個頁面，可以使用下列機制之間巡覽：An application typically has two or more pages, which can be navigated between using the following mechanisms: - 以宣告方式是藉由使用。Declaratively by using . - 以程式設計方式使用。Programmatically by using . - 以視覺化方式是藉由使用 瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]主控件，包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]， ，和。Visually by using the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host, including [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], , and . 使用頁面函式的結構化巡覽 ()，請參閱 < [ 結構化巡覽概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md)並[巡覽拓撲概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md)。For structured navigation using page functions (), see [Structured Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md) and [Navigation Topologies Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何在標準頁面上定義 只使用標記：The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupPage.xaml#markuppagemarkup)] 下列範例示範如何使用定義在標準頁面上只有程式碼：The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/CodePage.cs#codepagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/codepage.vb#codepagecodebehind)] 下列範例示範的標準網頁的方式使用標記和程式碼後置的組合所定義。The following example shows how a standard page is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml#markupandcodebehindpagemarkup)] [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml.cs#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/markupandcodebehindpage.xaml.vb#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不在保持運作 (請參閱 < )，它必須實作的預設建構函式，以允許[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]建立時在上一步瀏覽至的新執行個體，或巡覽歷程記錄。If a is not being kept alive (see ), it needs to implement a default constructor to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to create a new instance of it when navigated to in back or forward navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepAlive : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 執行個體是否要保留在巡覽記錄中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance is retained in navigation history.

value.span: 如果 執行個體要保留在巡覽記錄中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the instance is retained in navigation history; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當頁面第一次瀏覽至的新執行個體建立類別。When a page is first navigated to, a new instance of the class is created. 當頁面巡覽離開 （上一頁或下一頁） 時，頁面項目會新增至巡覽記錄中。When a page is navigated away from (either back or forward), an entry for the page is added to navigation history. 根據預設，項目未參考頁面物件。By default, the entry does not reference the page object. 相反地，項目包含網頁組件統一資源識別元 (URI)。Instead, the entry contains a pack uniform resource identifier (URI) for the page. 當頁面項目會巡覽至使用巡覽記錄時的 pack URI 用來建立頁面的新執行個體。When the entry for the page is navigated to using navigation history, the pack URI is used to create a new instance of the page. 此行為是預設值，以避免過多的記憶體使用量： 保留頁面執行個體可能會快速消耗記憶體，尤其是具有大量內容。This behavior is the default, to avoid excessive memory use: retaining page instances can quickly consume memory, particularly those with a nontrivial amount of content. 此問題會不斷擴大，因為沒有任何限制可以儲存在後端的項目數和向前巡覽記錄堆疊。This problem is augmented by the fact that there is no limit to the number of entries that can be stored in the back and forward stacks of navigation history. 相較之下，儲存網頁的 pack Uri 對幾乎不會影響記憶體耗用量。In contrast, storing pack URIs for pages has virtually no impact on memory consumption. 主要的副作用，建立網頁的新執行個體的是，網頁狀態並不會記住從頁面的一個執行個體到另一個。The main side effect of creating new instances of a page is that page state is not remembered from one instance of a page to another. 在這些情況下，Windows Presentation Foundation 提供數種技巧可記住其狀態。In these cases, Windows Presentation Foundation offers several techniques for remembering state. 若要讓頁面保持運作，您設定屬性，以`true`(預設值是`false`)。To keep a page alive, you set the property to `true` (the default is `false`). > [!NOTE] > 具現化並巡覽至使用只有程式碼的頁面 (例如，呼叫)，會自動保持運作。Pages that are instantiated and navigated to using only code (for example, calling ), are automatically kept alive. 您應該避免設定至`true`除非您需要：You should avoid setting to `true` unless you need to: - 當頁面有許多內容時，可能需要很長的時間，來具現化。When a page has a lot of content, it may take a long time to instantiate. 如果頁面不保持運作，且頁面經常瀏覽至，不斷地具現化頁面的成本可能會對使用者經驗的負面影響。If the page is not kept alive, and the page is frequently navigated to, the cost of constantly instantiating the page may have a negative impact on the user experience. 不過，從效能觀點來看，您應依賴預設設定並分析您的應用程式的效能;如果測試發現有低於應用程式所需範圍的載入時間的頁面，設定頁面保持運作可能會解決此問題的方法之一。However, from a performance perspective, you should rely on the default settings and profile your application's performance; if testing identifies pages with load times that fall below the range required for your application, configuring the pages to be kept alive may be one way to solve the problem. > [!NOTE] > 項目會維持開啟的頁面不會保留在巡覽記錄中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]如果使用者巡覽離開再回到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Entries for pages that are kept alive are not retained in navigation history of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] if a user navigates away from and back to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 只有不保持運作的頁面日誌項目會保留在巡覽記錄中。Only journal entries for pages that are not kept alive are retained in navigation history. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| > [!NOTE] > 此相依性屬性的中繼資料型別是，而非。The metadata type on this dependency property is , not . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]保留的執行個體跨多個巡覽的類別。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to retain an instance of the class across multiple navigations. [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang2)] [!code-csharp[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NavigationService As NavigationService

summary.span: 取得頁面主應用程式用來管理巡覽的巡覽服務。

span.span: Gets the navigation service that the host of the page is using to manage navigation.

value.span: 頁面主應用程式用來管理巡覽的 物件，如果該主應用程式不支援巡覽，則為 。

span.span: The object that the host of the page is using to manage navigation, or if the host does not support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面可以裝載多個類型的主機，包括， ， ，與瀏覽器。Pages can be hosted by multiple types of hosts, including , , , and a browser. 頁面通常需要其主應用程式的瀏覽至提供的頁面巡覽支援與整合。Pages often need to integrate with their host's navigation to provide in-page navigation support. 不過，由於頁面可能不知道其主應用程式將會在執行階段，它不能直接整合其主機的瀏覽成員若要這樣做。However, because a page may not know what its host will be at run time, it cannot integrate directly with its host's navigation members to do so. 相反地，它可以嘗試使用瀏覽服務，也就是一項服務，支援瀏覽器式巡覽，而且由封裝類別。Instead, it can attempt to use a navigation service, which is a service that supports browser-style navigation and is encapsulated by the class. 無法建立您自己執行個體，不過。You cannot create your own instance, though. 相反地，這類裝載類型， ，或瀏覽器建立他們自己執行個體，您可以從存取屬性。Instead, host types such as , , or a browser create their own instance that you can access from the property. 從傳回的巡覽服務屬性是的執行個體由第一個視覺化樹狀結構中向上巡覽器所管理的類別。The navigation service that is returned from the property is the instance of the class that is managed by the first navigator up the visual tree. 如果沒有找到其中一個項目，是`null`傳回，表示頁面的主機不支援導覽。If one is not found, `null` is returned, indicating a page's host does not support navigation. > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援瀏覽，而且不會提供巡覽服務。The class does not support navigation and does not provide a navigation service. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何頁面可以巡覽服務是否可用，請檢查，如果是的話，使用它來瀏覽回到前一個頁面。The following example shows how a page can check if a navigation service is available and, if so, use it to navigate back to the previous page. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsNavigationUI { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowsNavigationUI : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] 上看見 的導覽 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] is visible.

value.span: 如果可以看見裝載 的巡覽 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a host is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]預設為啟用瀏覽器樣式向前及向後巡覽。 displays navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] by default to enable browser-style forwards and backwards navigation. 如果頁面設定為，會自動開啟裝載中的頁面。If a page is set as the , automatically opens a to host the page in. 如果頁面不想使用預設瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，它可以設定至`false`。If the page does not want to use the default navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], it can set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]沒有與導覽整合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)]，它提供自己的巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，這可以是您要顯示或隱藏設定。Because [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] does not integrate with the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)], it provides its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], which can be shown or hidden by setting . [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 未整合[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，因此設定中的頁面上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]沒有任何作用。does integrate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], so setting on pages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] has no effect. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]若要隱藏巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to hide the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a . [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang2)] [!code-csharp[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)]

exception.span: 在非由 、 或瀏覽器裝載的 執行個體上，會檢查 屬性。

The for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 識別要求的範本選取器的索引鍵。The key that identifies the requested template selector. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .
The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性不會顯示，也會顯示從裝載之視窗的標題列。The value of the property is not displayed by , nor is it displayed from the title bar of the window that is hosting a . 相反地，您將設定變更主視窗的標題。Instead, you set to change the title of a host window. 也可以用來產生一種巡覽內容之巡覽歷程記錄項目名稱。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 下列資料片段用來自動建構巡覽歷程記錄項目名稱，依照優先順序：The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加屬性。The attached attribute. - 屬性。The property. - 屬性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]目前頁面The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 目前頁面的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果您已建立關聯物件具有一種巡覽記錄中的內容中，您可以指定所顯示的名稱在巡覽記錄項目中藉由覆寫。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name that appears in the navigation history entry by overriding . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定 之裝載 或 的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接裝載 之視窗的高度。

span.span: The height of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當套用直接裝載的視窗，其中包括： is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由裝載，將沒有任何作用，但您仍然可以取得的值。If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . A中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]可以只使用若要變更的高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; 設定也無法變更高度， ，或。A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the height of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the height cannot be changed by setting , , or . 最小高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]視窗是 150 個像素。The minimum height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 150 pixels. 瀏覽器裝載的頁面，這表示的值可能不會套用在可能的總高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]為不超過 150 位的像素的視窗。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 150 pixels. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從頁面設定視窗的高度。The following example shows how to set the height of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowHeightPage.xaml#setpagewindowheightxaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WindowTitle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.WindowTitle : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 之裝載 或 的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接裝載 之視窗的標題。

span.span: The title of a window that directly hosts the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，裝載的頁面上，視窗的標題包括並[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]，是目前裝載的檔案名稱 (具有.xaml 副檔名，如果頁面是鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或是副檔名為.xbap 頁面是否屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).By default, the title of a window that hosts a page, including and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], is the name of the file that is currently being hosted (with an .xaml extension if the page is loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or an .xbap extension if the page is part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]). 頁面上可以變更預設值，藉由設定其屬性。A page can change the default by setting its property. 一旦頁面設定視窗的標題，如此一來，視窗的標題不會變更直到另一個頁面會設定具有不同的值。Once a page sets the title of a window in this way, the window's title does not change until another page sets with a different value. > [!NOTE] > 必須是最上層的視窗中的內容片段造成影響; 如果裝載於，例如，設定不會變更主視窗的標題。The must be the topmost piece of content in a window for to have an effect; if a is hosted within a , for example, setting does not change the title of the host window. 也可以用來產生一種巡覽內容之巡覽歷程記錄項目名稱。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 下列資料片段用來自動建構巡覽歷程記錄項目名稱，依照優先順序：The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加屬性。The attached attribute. - 屬性。The property. - 屬性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]目前頁面The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 目前頁面的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果您已建立關聯物件與巡覽記錄中內容的部分，您可以藉由覆寫指定瀏覽歷程記錄項目的名稱值。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name value of a navigation history element by overriding . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定視窗的標題，從頁面。The following example shows how to set the title of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowTitleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowTitlePage.xaml#setpagewindowtitlexaml)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 之裝載 或 的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接裝載 之視窗的寬度。

span.span: The width of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當套用直接裝載的視窗，其中包括： is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由裝載，將沒有任何作用，但您仍然可以取得的值。If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . A中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]可以只使用若要變更的寬度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; 設定也無法變更寬度， ，或。A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the width of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the width cannot be changed by setting , , or . 最小寬度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]視窗是 250 個像素。The minimum width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 250 pixels. 瀏覽器裝載的頁面，這表示的值可能不會套用在可能的總寬度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]為人數少於 250 位的像素的視窗。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 250 pixels. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從頁面設定視窗的寬度。The following example shows how to set the width of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowWidthXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowWidthPage.xaml#setpagewindowwidthxaml)]
